HonorType.sDesc: Banished by clan
banished/ousted by party
Completing a Quest

Completing an adventure.

[+2 per level]

HonorType.sName: Clan:death of a fellow party member with high honor
HonorType.sDesc: Death of a felllow party member with high honor\n\n[-1 per level DO NOT APPLY TO NEUTRALS!]
Defeating/Vanquishing a hereditary enemy
Failing a Quest
Family Honor token (herald, flag, crest) lost or stolen.

HonorType.sName: Clan:Forming an alliance with another clan
HonorType.sDesc: Form an alliance with another clan
Pays off a family debt
Group honor token (standard, flag, crest) lost or stolen
Losing an inherited or birthright item

HonorType.sName: Clan:Member of clan dies with great honor
HonorType.sDesc: Member of clan dies with great honor (and stays dead)
Murder a family member
Recovering or avenging a stolen or destroyed honor token
Refusing one's clan leader/patriarch

HonorType.sName: Clan:Unnecessary deaths in course of mission
HonorType.sDesc: Unnecessary deaths in course of mission

HonorType.sName: Class:Assassin:assassinating a target of higher level
HonorType.sDesc: Assassinating a character/npc of higher level\n\n
True identity discovered
Cursing a pc/npc
Slaying or destroying someone.
harming or draining an NPC/PC
Healing or restoring an NPC/PC
Raising or resurrecting someone.
Removing a curse from a pc/npc
Trophy taken from a fallen foe
bragging and showing off battle scars
Create a new magic item which bears the creators name.
Create a new magic spell which bears the creators name.
overindulgence in food or drink
Getting caught while in the act of thieving!
Discovered by the local police/guards/authorities

HonorType.sName: Class:Thieves:losing an item of value to thievery
HonorType.sDesc: Losing an item of value to another thief.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Allowing a disarmed opponent to pick up his weapon
HonorType.sDesc: Allowing a disarmed opponent to pick up his weapon.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Allowing the enemy to draw first blood
HonorType.sDesc: Allowing the enemy to draw first blood

HonorType.sName: Combat:Allowing the enemy to remove their dead/wounded from the field
HonorType.sDesc: Allowing the enemy to remove their dead/wounded from the field
Attacking an unarmed or obviously inferior opponent.
Get taken as prisoner
Capture a battle standard, flag or crest during combat.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Defeated by lower social class opponent
HonorType.sDesc: Someone of lower social class defeated this award winning loser.
Defeated worthy adversary or battle-hardedned advesary in combat.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Defeating Someon of Higher Social Class
HonorType.sDesc: Beat the snot out of someone of higher social class, kick ass!
Delivered a critical hit.
Used the dirty fighting skill sucessfully. Penalty for dirty fighting does not apply if the other guy fights dirty first.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Entered Combat w/o Shield and Armor
HonorType.sDesc: Entered into mortal combat without a shield or armor. Only if your class/race allows use of such items.
Exercise bragging rights at a local tavern, inn or social gathering.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Flee a Fight with Equal Opponent
HonorType.sDesc: Run from a fight with equal opponent.
Flee from a battle that isnt going good or bad at the time.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Flee from a battle going poorly
HonorType.sDesc: Run from a battle that is obviously going poorly.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Fleeing a fight with a weaker opponent
HonorType.sDesc: Fleeing from a battle with a weaker opponent, wuss!

HonorType.sName: Combat:Fleeing a fight with superior opponent
HonorType.sDesc: Fleeing from a fight with a superior opponent.
Gloat over a battle victory
Die heroicly.
Humiliating a diametrically opposed enemy. if the character is witnessed humiliating an honorable character it could backfire resulting in heckler taking a hit on honor as well.
Delivered death blow to a helpless opponent

HonorType.sName: Combat:Land Killing blow on superior opponent in combined attack
HonorType.sDesc: Landing the killing blow on a obviously superior opponent in a combined attack.
Loose in a contest.
Refusing a fair challenge or contest.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Refusing medical treatment for the good of the party
HonorType.sDesc: Refusing medical treatment for the good of the party.

HonorType.sName: Combat:Save life of another at great risk to self
HonorType.sDesc: Save someone elses life at great risk to their own life.
Wussing out.
Survive a critical hit. Critical hits to the groin actually cause a loss of honor equal to the amount of severity.\n\n[Set specific award 1 point per severity level.]
Take an arrow hit or similar for another person.
Take prisoners.
Taunt an enemy into fighting
Unjustly slaying a prisoner or unarmed opponent who has yielded.
Pee on an enemy's corpse while in full view of his compatriots
Victory against overwhelming odds! Paladins, dark knights, cavaliers and night errants earn double the honor points for this action.\n

Walk away from a challenge. Remember that perception often belays intent. A character who offeres to buy a drink for someone who has just challenged him to a fight could be construed as "backing down" from a fight.
Advancing a level of experience
Aquiring land, per transaction

HonorType.sName: Personal:claiming territory from an entity of opposing alignment
HonorType.sDesc: claim territory from an entity of opposing alignment
completing a personal quest

HonorType.sDesc: dying and then getting raised

failing a personal quest
gaining mastery level in skill, 101%+

losing a level
losing magic item or weapon.

winning a contest

Granting a favor to an NPC

HonorType.sDesc: Acting on knowledge the character does not have (out of character knowledge)
Call pizza shop and make order, pay pizza guy

innocent or not

HonorType.sDesc: Someone laughs or mocks at you or fellow party member.

HonorType.sName: Social:Being admonished by another PC for wrongdoing
HonorType.sDesc: Being admonished by another pc for wrong doing.

HonorType.sName: Social:being publicly insulted by a superior
HonorType.sDesc: being publicly insulted or disparaged by a superior (higher level)
being publicly insulted or disparaged by an inferior (lower level)
breaking a blood oath.\n\n[See table 5B in PHB and set specific, minimum is -10% loss!]

HonorType.sName: Social:challenging a slight to one's honor
HonorType.sDesc: challenging a slight to one's honor
Convicted of a crime
failing a skill course
Fail an alignment audit
Falsely claiming bragging rights that belong to another or outright lying
Fulfilling a blood oath.\n

HonorType.sName: Social:going down a level in social class
HonorType.sDesc: going down a level in social class

HonorType.sName: Social:going up a level in social class
HonorType.sDesc: going up a level in social class
killing a host that has provided you food or shelter

HonorType.sName: Social:letting someone take advantage of you

HonorType.sDesc: neglecting to properly bury a member of one's own race
paying off an extortionist or shake-down
perpetrate a humiliating prank on enemy

HonorType.sName: Social:publicly humiliating a creature of higher level
HonorType.sDesc: publicly humiliate a creature/character of higher level or honor
rash or improper social behavior
reaching class name level
rendering an attitude adjustment

committing treason
wearing expensive equipment, 25% chance per item per day\n\n[See ornamentation in Chapter 16:Goods and Services in PHB and set specific amount]
